DialogText:
You’ve more than helped—you’ve proven yourself capable of handling difficult situations with professionalism and care. Because of your exemplary performance, I’m happy to inform you that your application for the Personal Defense Permit (PDP) has been approved. Congratulations, you’ve earned it. You should recieve it by mail, so head to the closest post office.

Keep up the good work, @p. We need more people like you looking out for this community. And remember, the PDP is a responsibility as much as it is a right. Use it wisely.

Lore: §2The Personal Defense Permit (PDP) is issued to responsible citizens who have demonstrated the need and capacity to carry small firearms for self-defense.
§2With rising concerns for personal safety in both urban and rural areas,
§2this permit grants individuals the right to protect themselves while also emphasizing the importance of responsible firearm handling and compliance with Gramados laws.
display.Name: §bPersonal Defense Permit §r锂

DialogMail.Subject: Official Notification: Personal Defense Permit Approval
